ModuleDescription: This module provides students the opportunity to learn about the psychological and social problems of hearing aid users and to develop and implement rehabilitation programs to suit individual needs.
Prerequisite: AUD5101: Acoustics AUD5104: Perception of Sound and Speech AUD5105 & AUD5111: Hearing Devices and Rehabilitation A - Part 1 & Part 2 AUD5106 & AUD5112: Clinical Audiology A
